title: Website font
content:
Does anyone know what font is used on [this](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015115322/http:/solarshop.bg/demo/) website?

WhatTheFont doesn't come up with the right font, and as it is a webdesign template, I cannot pick out what font it is with some kind of tool :S

I'm pretty sure it's a fairly well known font, but I cannot seem to find it...
author: daniel_ev

comments.content:
Helvetica Neue for "Studio". Headlines and text, various weights of [Open Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015115322/http:/www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/open-sans).  
You could have got your answer quicker by inspecting css code as Open Sans is embedded as webfont.

Thanks guys. I actually found "Open Sans" in the source code but I had no idea it was an actual font name :D

Thanks again!
